content.description:
“Tempus erat quo prima quies mortalibus aegris

incipit et dono divum gratissima serpit.

In somnis, ecce, ante oculos maestissimus Hector

visus adesse mihi largosque effundere fletus,

(5) raptatus bigis ut quondam, aterque cruento

pulvere perque pedes traiectus lora tumentes.”

Aeneid 2.268-273

Give a brief answer to each of the following questions. Answer in English unless the question specifically asks you to write out Latin words. Number your answer to each question.
content.question: Name one and only one aspect of Hector’s physical appearance described in lines 5-6 (aterque . . . tumentes).

frqParts.text: Name one and only one aspect of Hector’s physical appearance described in lines 5-6 (aterque . . . tumentes).

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
